❓ How to Use
  1. Upload an Excel file containing a 'Contact' column with phone numbers
  2. Optionally add a 'Message' column for personalized messages
  3. Upload an attachment file if you want to send the same file to all contacts
  4. Click 'Start Sending' and scan the QR code in the browser window that opens
  5. Monitor the real-time progress and logs above
⚡ Pro Tips
  • Use international format for phone numbers (e.g., +1234567890)
  • Keep your browser window open during the sending process
  • Test with a small batch first to ensure everything works
  • Attachment files are limited to 16MB maximum size
  • The process will resume if WhatsApp Web disconnects
